IN THE HIGH COURT OF HIMACHAL PRADESH AT SHIMLA
ON THE 15 TH DAY OF SEPTEMBER 2021 BEFORE
HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE TARLOK SINGH CHAUHAN &
HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE SATYEN VAIDYA
EXECUTION PETITION NO.304 OF 2021
Between:-
OM PRAKASH,
SON OF SHRI DEVI CHAND (RTD H.M.)
RESIDENT OF VILL. SAMBLI, P.O. PURANI
MANDI TEHSIL SADAR, DISTRICT MANDI,
H.P.
…...PETITIONER
(BY SH. H.S. RANGRA, ADVOCATE) AND
1. HIMACHAL ROAD TRANSPORT CORPORATION
THROUGH ITS MANAGING DIRECTOR, SHIMLA
2 REGIONAL MANAGER, HIMACHAL ROAD
TRANSPORT CORPORATION MANDI,
DISTT. MANDI H.P.
3. THE FINANCIAL ADVISOR CUM CAO, HRTC
HED OFFICE SHIMLA-3 H.P.
…..RESPONDENTS
(BY SH.VIKAS RAJPUT ADVOCATE)
